page.title: 04Arbroath farming,oil seed.
page.content:
Oil seed rape is a very interesting crop.To start off with, it grows like a weed.When it is fully grown it has a bright yellow flower.The pollen in the air can cause chest complaints and sore throats. The bees love this crop and many beekeepers put their hives in the corner of the field.However, many people think that it makes a course honey. The pod appears when the flower withers. When it is ripe it is cut by a special machine. The seeds are then dried and stored.
by Karen Muirhead.
